document_data.name: C. Balderk
document_data.mainbody: '''C. Balderk''' was an inhabitant of [[Baldur's Gate]] who died some years before the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: Balderk died at sea, sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, and was buried in the [[Lower City Graveyard]], next to the [[Durinbold Mausoleum]]. The gravestone was etched with a single inscription: "C Balderk. Taken by Umberlee's rage. Recovered by Her grace." Balderk's grave may had been accidentally desecrated, and the body risen as a [[zombie]] by [[Nina Dortmell]], a talented child with the [[gift]], who was trying to resurrect her recently deceased brother.
